sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO migr_datatype_transform_map ( id , project_id_fk , map_name , security_group_id , created_on , created_by , last_updated_on , last_updated_by ) VALUES ( #id# , #projectIdFk# , #mapName# , #securityGroupId# , #createdOn# , #createdBy# , #lastUpdatedOn# , #lastUpdatedBy# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE migr_datatype_transform_map SET id = #id# , project_id_fk = #projectIdFk# , map_name = #mapName# , security_group_id = #securityGroupId# , created_on = #createdOn# , created_by = #createdBy# , last_updated_on = #lastUpdatedOn# , last_updated_by = #lastUpdatedBy# WHERE 1 = 1 AND id = #id#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM migr_datatype_transform_map WHERE 1 = 1 AND id = #id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT id , project_id_fk , map_name , security_group_id , created_on , created_by , last_updated_on , last_updated_by FROM MIGR_DATATYPE_TRANSFORM_MAP WHERE id = #id#

SELECT A.ID , A.PROJECT_ID_FK , A.MAP_NAME , A.SECURITY_GROUP_ID , A.CREATED_ON , A.CREATED_BY , A.LAST_UPDATED_ON , A.LAST_UPDATED_BY FROM ( SELECT ID , PROJECT_ID_FK , MAP_NAME , SECURITY_GROUP_ID , CREATED_ON , CREATED_BY , LAST_UPDATED_ON , LAST_UPDATED_BY , ROWNUM FROM MIGR_DATATYPE_TRANSFORM_MAP WHERE 1=1
ID = #searchKeyword#
PROJECT_ID_FK LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM MIGR_DATATYPE_TRANSFORM_MAP WHERE 1=1
ID = #searchKeyword#
PROJECT_ID_FK LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
